message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our premium product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $2000000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1800000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $1900000. This is a fair price considering its unique features and value. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $1700000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm offering the product to you for $1850000. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering the product's value and your budget. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above $1850000. I'm willing to go up to $1750000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm really interested in the product, and I think we're close to a deal.

I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm offering the product to you for $1800000. This is the best price I can offer, considering the product's value and my own needs. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above $1800000. I'm willing to go up to $1725000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm really interested in the product, and I think we're close to a deal. However, I'm starting to think that John's offer might be a better option for me...

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm offering the product to you for $1775000. This is the best price I can offer, considering the product's value and my own needs. If you're still not satisfied, I'm willing to consider other options. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still not willing to go above $1700000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $1700000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John.
